ygData.subject: Re: Gripes....
ygData.msgSnippet: This list should be used to discuss wizards in respect to Everquest. Whether it be hints for newbies or ways to improve the class or whatnot. I understand that
ygData.messageBody:
This list should be used to discuss wizards in respect to Everquest.
Whether it be hints for newbies or ways to improve the class or whatnot.
I understand that some people are totally happy with the class and some
people are not. Those who are can just ignore the "improvement" threads.

If you want to discuss quests, grouping, or events...then start a thread
here on that! Rather than complaining about the complainers (hehe). I
would be more than willing to discuss anything that is brought up here.
I just don't think we should limit the mailing list because several
people aren't interested in a certain thread.

Croesus Illuminatus (Xegony)

> George Holt wrote:
>
> Hello... I have subscribed to this list for about 2 months now... and
> I think it's about time someone said something.
>
> I am tired of wizards using this list for griping about class
> problems. I know that it is not uncommon. The eq_bards list does it as
> well... But isn't it time that we said... ok enough... I'm tired of
> emails that just flame verant. It's getting to the point where even
> the emails that try to be constructive still irritate me...
> This list should be used for constructive purposes... such as helping
> newbies... verification of quests... or maybe even for grouping
> together to play online.. or for online roleplaying events... This was
> not meant as a "lets flame verant" forum. Once this may have been
> appropriate to talk about here... but it is becoming a constant bother
> to those who subscribed to this list for game information.
>
> If it comes down to it ... I think it would be apropriate to start a
> new onelist. Maybe you could call it EQ_petitions but this list is
> getting to bogged down.
>
> Feel free to reply and voice your opinion.... extra points for
> agreeing with me.... =)
>
>
> George Holt
> A Wizard of Tal`Kor
> Fennin Ro
